description: Number of primes between successive pairs of twin primes.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
example: a(8)= 4 because between the 8th and 9th pairs of twins there are 4 primes: (71,73) 79 83 89 97 (101,103).
author: Den Roussel (DenRoussel(AT)webtv.net)
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Labos Elemer_, Mar 23 2000
